general.gigTitle: do wordpress website creation, develop redesign or fix bugs

sellerCard.description: Hey, We are a web design agency from Sri Lanka. We are also WordPress developers and Django developers. We know front and back-end web development. My priority is to satisfy my clients. We will ensure your website will be good-looking, user-friendly, and fully responsive. So feel free to contact Us on Fiverr.

description.content:
There are three responses to a piece of design yes, no, and WOW! Let me bring the "WOW" into your life! :)


I am a web designer highly experienced in WordPress, Woo commerce, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP and I have made 1500+ live websites. I am always willing to help my customers and offer them the best web project.


Send me a message so I can start building your new awesome responsive website.



Why Me?

1. I will give you 1-week free support

2. 100% money-back guarantee

3. Unlimited revisions

4. Super fast delivery before the deadline

5. Response time less than 15 min

6. Quality work

7. Friendly Communication

8. 100% work satisfaction 


I will develop professional websites for you like:


  • E-Commerce
  • Blog / News
  • Video Sharing
  • Fashion 
  • Booking website
  • Entertainment 
  • Magazine
  • Clinic/Medical Lab / Hospital
  • And many more...


I am Offering:

  • Professional  & customized design
  • User-Friendly & interactive
  • Great communication
  • Full money-back guarantee


 Kindly inbox me before placing your order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
First I need a clear description of your project/website. And your media files. (logos, images, etc)

Then I can start to build your website on my hosting account until you prepare your domain & hosting.

Then I need your website wp-admin login access and Cpanel login credentials to upload your site

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you Design Fresh New WordPress Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes!! I can build your beautiful and Eye catching "Online Business" WordPress website, that drives real business results.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will i able to edit my content and images later?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes WordPress Website is full editable.you can easily edit your content and images and don't worry when we i done with the website i will make a Explanation video for you how can you edit your images and content so That will be helpful for you :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What If i not satisfied with your work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will provide unlimited revisions until you completely satisfied with the work.But if a scene comes that you are not satisfied with my work, I will pay the money back to you.

reviews.comment: Its always great to work with Imesh. I know I can fully trust him and the quality of his work, which makes all the difference. Thank you!

seller_response.comment: It was an absolute pleasure, and Id love to collaborate again in the future!

reviews.comment: Imesh was lovely. Great to work with. Definately a worthy addition to the team.

seller_response.comment: Thank you Rob. It's a pleasure to work with you.

reviews.comment: I feel lucky to always have Imesh to reach out to when I have an issue with my website. He is always kind, polite, and cooperative. He excels in his job, whether it involves design or dealing with malware. I trust him completely and highly recommend his services. Thank you!
Great to deal with Imesh, quality work and great communication.

seller_response.comment: Thank you! It's a pleasure to working with you Anthony.

reviews.comment: Pegasiz_webs is great to work with. Polite, on time, easy to communicate with, and really great at what he does. Most importantly, I know I can trust him. I highly recommend this Gig

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much Sarah.  Its pleasure to work with you.
